dublin_core.dcvalue: Health workers and managers used Deki point-of-care devices, airFio cloud and Spiri gateway for malaria RDT, reporting and case management
FioNet: Mobile Diagnostics Integrated with Cloud Information Services
CHW, Doctor/provider, Nurse, District manager, Hospital, Clinic
Dr. Elias Sory, Director, Fio Health Ghana Ltd. | Tel: +233-302-733-011, Email: esory@fioghana.com
Ghana (Greater Accra East, Dangme East and Dangme West) Fionet is also being utilized in Kenya, Tanzania, Indonesia, Democratic Republic of Congo, Sierra Leone, and Colombia.
Ghana Health Service, Fio Corporation, Fio Health Ghana Ltd.
FioNet: Mobile Diagnostics Integrated with Cloud Information Services
Sensors and point-of-care diagnostics, Electronic health records, Data collection and reporting, Human resource management, Infectious diseases, HIV/AIDS, Malaria and other vector-borne diseases
